author: pipermerriam
content: Current rough plans are to open applications for the second cohort (aka cohort-one) on Monday. We'll likely only accept applications through the end of next week, aiming to kick the cohort off by end of Sept at the very latest.

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: I think it's inherited from Bitcoin, e.g. OP_PUSHDATA1

author: treyzania
content: the actual consts are capitalized like that, but the word "OPCODE" just as a noun doesn't stand for anything

author: abcoathup
content: Are you just using existing applicants or are you going to advertise for new applications?

author: joshuaisbuilding
content:
> **open applications** for the second cohort

Sounds like new applications to me.

author: joshuaisbuilding
content: Ethereum.org are creating a new 'Ethereum Governance' page. As part of the 'Get Involved' section, we're considering linking out the apprenticeship program. I was just going to use the announcement blog but if there is a better place to link to let me know ðŸ™‚

author: pipermerriam
content: My plan will be to do a full set of new applications.  Anyone who previously applied should re-apply.

author: potuz
content: You'll collect a lot of pictures of cute animals!

author: pipermerriam
content: My primary motivation for running the program.... cute animals!

author: newweiv
content: lol this is a funny coincidence cuz im just reading these messages, but I had a dream about the next cohort of cdap beginning and there were thousands of people, a lot of high schoolers for some reason, and everyone was taking in a giant mess hall, very similar to hogwarts. but i know it was cdap cuz at one point piper was lecturing everyone from a couch

author: pipermerriam
content: We will be using the sorting hat this time around so you weren't too far off.
